meanings.definition: The part of a shirt that covers the arm.
meanings.sent1: He rolled up his shirtsleeves to wash the dishes.
meanings.sent2: The tailor carefully stitched the shirtsleeves onto the shirt.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy tugged on the shirtsleeves, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a warm embrace, wrapping around me like soft shirtsleeves.
meanings.sent5: The shirtsleeves fluttered in the wind like flags of freedom.

meanings.definition: Wearing a shirt without a jacket or coat.
meanings.sent1: On casual Fridays, the office allows shirtsleeves attire.
meanings.sent2: He felt comfortable in his shirtsleeves outfit during the warm summer day.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of his shirtsleeves, surprising the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and welcoming as a sunny day in shirtsleeves.
meanings.sent5: The simplicity of his shirtsleeves style spoke volumes about his laid-back personality.
